channel.title: When droping bottom items in inventory, clicks the buttons such as friends list
channel.description: Basically when you right click in object at the bottom of your inventory, the drop option will be over a button such as friends list, log out door etc. When you click drop it will drop the item and click the button underneath. How do I fix this. Thanks :D

item.title: When droping bottom items in inventory, clicks the buttons such as friends list
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag

Basically when you right click in object at the bottom of your inventory, the drop option will be over a button such as friends list, log out door etc. When you click drop it will drop the item and click the button underneath. How do I fix this. Thanks
